name: fitbot

scripts.lint: eslint *.js middleware/ models/ services/ utils/ config/
scripts.lint:fix: eslint *.js middleware/ models/ services/ utils/ config/ --fix
scripts.format: prettier --write *.js middleware/ models/ services/ utils/ config/ public/
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Jay karan chaturvedi
description: An AI chatbot that helps users track daily nutrient intake based on BMI and activity level
